name: Meng Zhang

weaponEffects.title: Volt resonance
weaponEffects.description: Increase Volt ATK by **15%** and Volt Resistance by **25%**. Activate by equipping **2** or more Volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with effects of the same type.

weaponEffects.title: Thunder - Field
weaponEffects.description: When Meng Zhang hits any attack, it will deal damage equal to **1,875%** of volt ATK + **31%** * own maximum HP + **1,125%** * the sum of all elemental resistances + **3, 750%** * crit rate to nearby targets , can be triggered at most once every **1.5** seconds, and volt damage is regarded as normal attack damage. If a non-volt weapon is equipped, volt damage will be increased to **2.5** times. Additionally, volt damage is not affected by damage-increasing effects other than the rare attributes of Titan equipment, nor will it trigger additional attack effects.

advancements:
After Meng Zhang charges his power, **2** little green dragons will appear at a time, and each little green dragon will restore **20%** of the maximum HP for the summoned object; the damage of Meng Zhang's charged attack and the little green dragon's damage will be increased by **50%**.

Gain **3** layers of Azure Dragon Power immediately after releasing Qingyun Frightening Moon, and gain **1** layer of Azure Dragon Power after releasing other Thunder weapon skills.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **16%**.

Qinglong: The cooldown of the main skill of the thunder weapon is reduced by **33%**, not affected by skill cooldown clear, reset, and change (excluding Gleipnir's 'Sonic Carnival'), and a **30%** increase in lightning damage.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by **32%**.

When receiving fatal damage, it will resist the fatal damage and be immune to damage for a period of time, **60** seconds cooldown.

When the Resonance of Resolute is activated, the Meng Zhang Linking Skill can be released to pull non-boss monsters (ignoring Super Body).

When Resonance of Perseverance is activated and you are in the team dungeon.
After releasing Qingyun Frightening Moon, gain **15%** volt damage and **25%** final damage increase for **30** seconds, non-superimposed

abilities.name: Jumping bead sense jade
abilities.description: When on the ground, click general attack to perform five consecutive attacks.

abilities.name: Landing
abilities.description: While airborne, press normal attack to attack 5 times in the air while consuming endurance.

abilities.name: Meng Zhang Guanri
abilities.description:
When on the ground, when using the first to fourth general attack, press and hold the general attack to trigger Meng Zhang Guanri, and consume endurance.

Launch an attack to the front, dealing damage equal to **666%** of ATK + **1,257** to targets in range, and float the target.

abilities.name: Choice Explosion
abilities.description:
Press and hold to enter the power storage, and continue to fire thunder and lightning at the target, each hit deals damage equal to **128%** of ATK + **x**.

During the power storage period, a small green dragon will be summoned every **1.5** seconds, releasing a shock wave to the target, dealing damage equal to **200%** of ATK + **x**.

Accumulative attacks and Xiaoqinglong shock waves will reduce the target’s lightning resistance within **10** seconds with each hit **3%**, up to **15%** reduction.

During the power-up period, the player will dominate the body and every **1.5** seconds the player will get **10%** of the maximum health protection.

, The shield has a maximum life of **30%**, and the shield lasts for up to **15** seconds. Activate when perseverance resonates, additional shields will be provided to allied units (=**10%** of the player’s health).

abilities.name: Youlong
abilities.description:
When the pioneer is stagnant, when using the first to fourth general attack, press and hold the general attack to touch travel the dragon and consume stamina.

Launch an attack to the front, dealing **666%** of ATK + **1,257** to targets in range, and float the target.

abilities.name: Qinglong Power
abilities.description:
When using Meng Zhang, every **3** general attack hits will add **1** layer of 'Qinglong Power' to yourself.

, Lasts for 30 seconds, up to **8** layers can be obtained, and when the perseverance resonance is activated, it will be obtained (green Dragon Power Layers * **1.5**)% damage reduction.

abilities.name: Dodge
abilities.description:
Dodge right before getting hit to trigger a Phantasia, cooldown 15 seconds, reducing the speed of enemies within an area. Become immune to hitstun for **0.5** seconds while dodging.

Passive: Send thunder and lightning hydrangea to the front.

abilities.name: Electric type
abilities.description:
Within a short period of time after any dodge, click general attack to trigger a power-up.

Instantly appears in the position of Thunder Hydrangea, dealing **215%** of ATK + **4** to nearby targets, and generate a thunder pool, dealing a total of **302%** of ATK + **570**.

Continue to damage and absorb enemy units, and then return to the starting position.

**Passive**: During the electric shock, you dominate the body, and after the electric system hits the target, you get a layer of 'Green Dragon Power'.

abilities.name: Qingyun Youyue
abilities.description:
Qinglong flies to the sky, dealing damage equal to **3,591%** of ATK + **6,778** to targets in range and summon the Qinglong. During the existence of the Qinglong, it will continue to consume the power of the Qinglong and release the thunder.

Release up to **8** thunderbolts, the damage range of thunderbolts is **1,313%** of ATK + **2,478**.

When Qinglong exits, he deals another **3,000%** of ATK + **5,662** damage.

The skill initially has **2** points, and **1** skill point is restored every **30** seconds.

**Passive**: When equipped with **3** volt weapons, trigger the Qinglong Level **2** effect.

abilities.name: Flying dragon in the sky
abilities.description:
When ***weapon charge is full*** or ***Phantasia*** is triggered, switching to this weapon will **clear all debuffs from the user** and gather strength and detonates after hitting the ground, dealing damage equal to **3,060%** of ATK + **5,775**, and floating the target, during which the Wanderer has damage immunity for **2.6** seconds (unavailable in Apex League).

**Passive**: After holding Meng Zhang during the illusion period or switching from other weapons to returning the bend, it will create a powerful range damage (not subject to damage enhancement effects other than the rare attributes of Titan equipment)

If the effect is affected, it can be triggered up to **1** time during the illusion period)
